Player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jm.constants.Alignments, jm.constants.DrumMap, jm.constants.Durations, jm.constants.Dynamics, jm.constants.Frequencies, jm.constants.Noises, jm.constants.Panning, jm.constants.Pitches, jm.constants.ProgramChanges, jm.constants.RhythmValues, jm.constants.Scales, jm.constants.Tunings, jm.constants.Volumes, jm.constants.Waveforms, jm.JMC

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements jm.JMC
    Used to create audible representations of EventStream objects in the form of .midi format.

                                                   Scale localScale)
        Converts a .midi file into an EventStream object
        Parameters:
        location - the location of the .midi file
        localScale - the scale to associate with the EventStream
        Returns:
        the EventStream matching the .midi file.
